title: Joshua
description: Joshua works for a company that makes simulations of historical personages. At an academic conference in 2052 he is pursued by Morgana, an ambitious well-connected woman from a rival company, seeking a partner for a controversial killer application. Morgana wants to produce and market an interactive simulation of Jesus Christ. Joshua's impulse is to reject Morgana's plan as presumptuous and tasteless. But as time passes he becomes intrigued by the challenge, and also dangerously fascinated by Morgana herself...
author: Thomas G. Dixon
